Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: yīnwèi zài dōngjì hé xiàjì de lǚxíng zhōng bǎohù tāmen
gù jiào tāmen chóngjìng zhè tiān fáng de zhǔ
tā céng wèi jīhuang ér zhènjì tāmen, céng wèi kǒngbù ér bǎoyòu tāmen
Nǐ céng jiàn fǒurèn bàoyìng rì de rén ma
qiě bù miǎnlì rén zhènjì pínmín de rén
tā 458	dì yī ￮bā zhāng duō fú (kǎo sài ěr) men shì hūshì bài gōng de
tāmen shì bù kěn jiè rén shíwù de
Wǒ què yǐ cì nǐ duō fú
gù nǐ yīngdāng wèi nǐ de zhǔ ér lǐbài, bìng zǎi xīshēng
Yuànhèn nǐ zhě, què shì juéhòu de
